Model Viewers

gxbox-view

gxbox-view opens an existing model HDF5 file in the 3D viewer without recomputing.

Expected inputs:

  • A model file containing at least one of: - corona (preferred), - nlfff / pot (accepted and normalized), or - chromo with sufficient magnetic cube fields.

Usage:

gxbox-view /path/to/model.h5

Optional file picker mode:

gxbox-view --pick

gxrefmap-view

gxrefmap-view is a 2D map browser for base maps and refmaps stored in model HDF5 files.

Expected layout:

  • Base maps: - base/bx, base/by, base/bz, base/ic, base/chromo_mask - base header in base/index (fallbacks: base/index_header, base/wcs_header)

  • Refmaps: - refmaps/<map_id>/data - refmaps/<map_id>/wcs_header

Usage:

gxrefmap-view /path/to/model.h5

List available maps only:

gxrefmap-view /path/to/model.h5 --list

Start from a specific map:

gxrefmap-view /path/to/model.h5 --start AIA_94
